Container.Name: 3D-Print-Queue
Container.Overview:
A comprehensive web application for managing 3D print requests with user authentication, showcase gallery, and admin panel.
Features: - Queue management with drag-and-drop reordering - User authentication with email verification - Showcase gallery for sharing prints - Email notifications - Admin panel with user management - Access logs and IP management
IMPORTANT: After first start, access the web UI and register an admin account using the ADMIN_PASSWORD you set.
Container.Requires: MongoDB container - will be automatically created as a dependency

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the web interface

Config.Name: API Port
Config.Description: Port for the API server (internal use)

Config.Name: Uploads Directory
Config.Description: Directory where uploaded showcase images are stored

Config.Name: JWT Secret
Config.Description: REQUIRED: Secret key for JWT tokens. Generate a random string (e.g., use: openssl rand -hex 32)

Config.Name: Admin Password
Config.Description: Password required to register as admin. CHANGE THIS from default!
